notes: Natural ingredients specialist now part of Givaudan. Albizia Julibrissin Extract for anti-glycation and firming benefits. Kigelia Africana Extract stimulates elastin synthesis. Marine algae extracts with polysaccharide firming agents. Plant-based peptide alternatives. Focus on natural and organic certified ingredients. Strong botanical sourcing and extraction expertise. Clinical validation for key actives. COSMOS, Ecocert, and NATRUE certified. Excellent for clean beauty and natural brands. Global distribution through Givaudan network. Suitable for natural anti-aging and firming formulations.
